means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 雷恩博来源于古法语人名+日耳曼语，含义是“忠告+勇敢的”(counsel+bold,brave)，拼写形式受民俗语源的影响，与“虹”(rainbow)有关联
[地名] [澳大利亚、美国] 雷恩博

word_mean: 虹，阳光射入水滴(雨滴、毛毛雨滴或雾滴)经折射和反射而在雨幕或雾幕上形成视角半径约42°的彩色(内紫外红)或白色光环。

phrase.cizu_name: at the end of the rainbow

jx.jx_en_mean: used to refer to something much sought after but impossible to attain
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在可望而不可即的地方
做白日梦，幻想，追寻彩虹

encyclopedia.content: rainbow，韩国电子竞技选手，魔兽争霸(solo)项目，使用人族。由于手速快，APM值远远高于其他选手，故又被称为“抽风人族”。

entry.def: A rainbow is an arch of different colours that you can sometimes see in the sky when it is raining.

example.ex: ...silk brocade of every colour of the rainbow.
example.tran: 彩虹般五颜六色的绸缎

entry.def: A rainbow of colours is a wide range of bright colours.
If you say that something is at the end of the rainbow, you mean that people want it but it is almost impossible to obtain or achieve.

example.ex: The promise of a cure — the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow — often makes sensible people do irrational things.
example.tran: 找到一种治愈方法的希望——就如同永远够不到的一桶黄金——往往让理智的人们做出不理智的事情。

means.word_mean: 1. an arc of colored light in the sky caused by refraction of the sun's rays by rain

list.explanation: 五彩丸(指用彩色胶囊包装的致幻药丸)

example.en: Old Joe is hooked on rainbow pills.
example.zh: 老乔服用五彩丸上瘾了。

sentences.en: When the sun shines through a light rain, it makes a rainbow.

sentences.en: At sight of the rainbow, the children were more glad than the parents.
sentences.cn: 看见彩虹, 孩子们比大人更高兴。
